original_text: Israel has sinned; they have violated my covenant, which I commanded them to keep. They have taken some of the devoted things; they have stolen, they have lied, they have put them with their own possessions.
korean_text: 이스라엘이 범죄하여 내가 그들에게 명령한 나의 언약을 어겼으며 또한 그들이 온전히 바친 물건을 가져가고 도둑질하며 속이고 그것을 그들의 물건들 가운데에 두었느니라

sentences.original_text: which I commanded them to keep
They have taken some of the devoted things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 바쳐진 물건들 중 일부를 취했습니다

sentences.original_text: they have put them with their own possessions
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것들을 자신들의 소유물과 함께 두었습니다
